attributes.action: Create a task force to put the necessary measures in place to reopen London
attributes.additional_details:
Starting the safety measures, infrastructures, new ways of travelling, reliable PPE supply (for all workers in all industries), reopening airports and means of travel nationwide and then internationally, etc
There are a lot to do as we know there are no immediate solution or vaccine so for any sort of normal life to even start we need to think about new ways. Other countries have already started and instead of blaming the government for any delays in initial responses its time to change now.
attributes.background: Covid19 wont have a vaccine anytime soon and we need to start adoption to the new ways of doing business and start putting the measures in place and reopen London. It has to be safe but it has to start now if we want to have a chance to get back to normal life, London can be start for the rest of UK

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  Since you started your petition a range of changes to lockdown regulations have been announced. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
